keyMoments.title: Sabotage of Giants' Duel
keyMoments.description: Baroque Works Officer Agents execute their plan to interfere with Dorry and Brogy's sacred duel.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the organization's ruthless methods and disregard for honor or tradition.

keyMoments.title: Capture of Princess Vivi
keyMoments.description: Mr. 5 successfully captures Princess Vivi, fulfilling one of Baroque Works' primary objectives.
keyMoments.significance: Baroque Works achieves a major tactical victory against the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Mr. 3's Wax Statue Plan
keyMoments.description: Mr. 3 reveals his artistic plan to turn Baroque Works' enemies into wax statues.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the sadistic and theatrical nature of Baroque Works' Officer Agents.

description: A secret criminal organization operating in Paradise, led by one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea. Officer Agents Mr. 3, Mr. 5, and their partners are executing a mission to eliminate the Straw Hats and capture Princess Vivi on Little Garden.
